## BaseClientOptions.logApi property

Whether to log \[ApiReq\] and \[ApiRes\] by the `logger`<!-- -->. NOTICE: if `logger` is `undefined`<!-- -->, no log would be printed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
logApi: boolean;
```
